https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/1CIiGNzWn5WLBpXv83jHa0exceU.jpg Frank left his life as a soldier behind and wants to rebuild his life in Brandenburg. He is on his way to meet his daughter, Lily, after a long time of not seeing her. As he stops at a gas station he meets Andreas, who needs a ride to Berlin. Reluctantly, Frank agrees to take Andreas with him - unaware of the consequences. Berlin Falling
